title: Man's Best Friend
description: MAN’S BEST FRIEND drama: 2m 1f Terrie and Max are completely in love but the diagnosis of a potentially fatal disease causes these young lovers to wonder if happiness can be found after inevitable heartache. Written with matter-of-fact sincerity, this play requires honest acting that will undoubtedly affect any audience. Man’s Best Friend is perfect for a traveling competition or festival with its small cast, short run-time and simple staging. Plus, the author will consider gender changes for any of the 3 roles.
author: Cody Underwood
